a.n: BFC 51 - MMA, Belarusian Fighting Championships, Minsk, Belarus 30.04.2020

p.d: Brand BFC is over 10 years now and became the most successful and popular promotion in Eastern Europe providing high-profile fights and great shows with world A-class and top-ranked fighters as Andrei Arlovski, Alexei Kudin, Artem Damkovsky and Khabib Nurmagomedov.
